byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington, and Elizabeth A. Harris reporting from New York.

abstract: Prince Sultan bin Abdul Aziz, heir apparent to the Saudi throne and one of the kingdom’s most powerful princes until illness sapped his strength, dies at the age of at least 80 and by some accounts 85, raising complex succession issues at a time of political turmoil in the region.
snippet: Prince Sultan was the heir apparent to the Saudi throne and one of the kingdom’s most powerful princes.
lead_paragraph: Prince Sultan was the heir apparent to the Saudi throne and one of the kingdom’s most powerful princes.

headline.main: Prince Sultan bin Abdel Aziz of Saudi Arabia Dies
headline.print_headline: Prince Sultan bin Abdel Aziz of Saudi Arabia Dies
headline.seo: Prince Sultan bin Abdel Aziz of Saudi Arabia Dies
